content: Phase 1: Core POC - Email + Lead Capture Integration
Phase 1: Install Resend and create email service
Phase 1: Create /api/leads endpoint with DB save + email send
Phase 1: Write and run test_core.py - verify email+DB works
Phase 1: POC Testing with testing agent
Phase 2: Call design_agent for UI guidelines
Phase 2: Backend - Complete API endpoints (setups, menus, gallery, testimonials)
Phase 2: Frontend - Full website with all pages and components
Phase 2: Interactive Features - Hashtag Generator + Drink Generator
Phase 2: All user stories covered in Development and testing
Phase 2: End to End Testing using Testing Agent
